properties.entry:
COOPERATIVE CHASE: Instructions for Stage {self.roundIndexLabel}

Stage {self.roundIndexLabel} consists of {self.repeat} rounds. As in the previous stage, you will collect green tokens and you will earn {dollarsPerToken} for each token collected. However, note that in this stage, the growth rate of the resource is different than in the previous stage. The length of each of the following {self.repeat} rounds in this stage is {self.duration} seconds.
